typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Plan_ID                             } as string,
		{Plan_Start_Date               } as string,
		{Plan_End_Date                    } as string,
		{Plan_Name_Description            } as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as integer,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		{market_Type                       } as string,
		{Grandfathered_Plan_Flag              } as string,
		{Metal_level                        } as integer,
		{Acturial_Value } as integer,
		Issuer_State as string,
		Issuer_ID as string,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({Plan_Start_Date               } = coalesce(toDate(Plan_Start_Date,'yyyy/MM/dd')),
		column2 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> StringtoDate
